page.title: 02WEASENHAM ST PETER VILLAGE
page.content: The village of Weasenham St Peter has a population of 142 living in a total of 87 houses. At the centre is an attractive village green and pond.The church stands slightly to the north of the village.There is a general shop and Post Office,a public house "The Fox and Hounds" and an Antique and Craft shop. WEEKLY DELIVERIES to the village Baker Tues., Thurs., Sat. Butcher Tues., Fri. Fresh fish Weds. Fish and chips Frid. Milk is delivered every other day. Newspapers are delivered daily. A hairdressing shop is open 3 days a week. There is a doctor's surgery in a private house every Friday lunchtime. Doctors attend from Massingham.Litcham doctors also visit the village.
